message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and benefits, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, I am willing to sell it to you for $14000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-value item at a competitive price. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
